58018b02-328c-4011-bd7c-b8f14d0a3bf9.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

0b621aa4-ada9-4577-9204-65704d4d1ab4.name: Bad Sight (Farsighted)
0b621aa4-ada9-4577-9204-65704d4d1ab4.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

7361a39a-444c-4393-8e97-a2b44ad993f3.name: Bad Sight (Nearsighted)
7361a39a-444c-4393-8e97-a2b44ad993f3.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks
